task.title: Exporting Pipelines for DPM
task.shortdesc: If you develop pipelines in a that is not registered with , you can export the pipelines and then import the pipelines into . When a is registered with , it's simplest to publish the pipelines directly to .

context.p: pipelinesexporting for DPMYou can export a pipeline for use in when the pipeline is valid. You can export a single pipeline or a set of pipelines at one time.

When you export a single pipeline, generates a JSON file named after the pipeline, as follows: <pipeline name>.json. The generated JSON file includes the definition of each stage library used in the pipeline.
When you export a set of pipelines, creates a ZIP file named pipelines.zip.
saves the files to your default downloads directory.
context.note: To export pipelines for use in another , see .

step.cmd: To export a single pipeline, from the Home page, select the pipeline from the list, click the More icon, and then click Export for DPM.

info.p: To export a set of pipelines, select multiple pipelines, click the More icon, and then click Export for DPM.

step.cmd: Or, to export a pipeline in the pipeline canvas, click the More icon for the pipeline and then click Export for DPM.
